codexUsage.errorNotLoggedIn: Not signed in to ChatGPT, unable to fetch rate limit

codexErrors.cliExited: Error. Try switching to another WSL distribution, refresh, then save.
codexErrors.cliNotFound:
Codex CLI not found. Please try:
1. npm install -g @openai/codex
2. Or install Cursor/Windsurf extension
3. Or set CODEXFLOW_CODEX_BIN environment variable

codexErrors.wslNotSupported: WSL mode is not supported on this platform
codexErrors.wslPathConversionFailed: Unable to convert Codex CLI path for WSL usage
